message.body: Hey! We're planning to head to CCB around 2. See you there?
Ack! We went to buy tix earlier this week, & presales were done. At the door was more $ so we decided not to go :( Enjoy it for me!
Bummer. Maybe Broad St. Bark Fest tonight? Not sure when we're heading over though.
This actually sucks. We're grabbing a beer here and then heading to The Bar, if you're interested!
